title: The Power of Concentration
description: The Power of Concentration was first published in the USA in 1918. As a pioneering self-help book, it deals with developing the faculty of deep concentration to achieve your personal and professional goals.  In The Power of Concentration, Dumont describes how you can achieve self-mastery, how to gain what you want through concentration, how to obtain business results through concentration, and how you can use concentration to overcome bad habits, among others.
author: Theron Q. Dumont
